mapper.select: SELECT p.prd_code, p.sub_category_code, p.prd_name, p.prd_maker, p.prd_gender, p.prd_age, p.prd_style, p.prd_regular_price, p.prd_discount_price, p.prd_brif_explain, p.prd_detail_explain, p.prd_inventory, p.prd_sales_volume, p.prd_main_image FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN sub_category sc ON p.sub_category_code = sc.sub_category_code LEFT OUTER JOIN parent_category pc ON sc.parent_category_code = pc.parent_category_code WHERE pc.parent_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWords}, '%') OR pc.parent_category_name LIKE CONCAT(#{searchWords}, '%') OR pc.parent_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWords}) OR pc.parent_category_name LIKE(#{searchWords});
